alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 9:49AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Contra Costa County through 1015 AM PST... At 948 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pleasant Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oakland, Concord, Richmond, Antioch, Walnut Creek, Pittsburg, Danville, Martinez, Oakley, Pleasant Hill, Lafayette, Brentwood, Orinda, Moraga, Clayton, West Pittsburg, West Pittsburg Cdp, Moraga Town, Alamo and Clyde. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; East Bay Interior Valleys
